General.Name: Imeik Technology Development Co
General.Description: Imeik Technology Development Co.,Ltd focuses on the research and development, production, and sale of biomedical materials. The company offers medical beauty field products, including Moisten Angel, IFRESH, Yimei, Hearty, Bonita Bonita, and Tightly. It also offers skin care products, including moisturizing lotions, anti-wrinkle firming kinetic energy liquids, essence creams, hydrating firming masks, chitosan B5 repair sprays, and purifying and brightening kinetic liquids. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Beijing, China.
